name: DATASHEET WORDPRESS PLUGIN
author: Sven Kronshage

sections.description:
With datasheet you can extend your Post with content fields. So it is easy to use and you don’t need to format your html post for standart values.

Related Links:

  • Plugin Homepage

License

Good news, this plugin is free for everyone! Since it’s released under the GPL, you can use it free of charge on your personal or commercial blog. But if you enjoy this plugin, you can thank me and leave a small donation for the time I’ve spent writing and supporting this plugin. And I really don’t want to know how many hours of my life this plugin has already eaten ðŸ˜‰

Translations

English and German
sections.installation:
1. Upload the full directory into your wp-content/plugins directory
  2. Activate the plugin at the plugin administration page
sections.changelog:
1. Bugfix Modulo warning in datasheet class
  2. Faster paging for IE

short_description: With this tool you can administer data sheets plus to your present contents and allow to register
